definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
(bird species of China) golden bush robin (Tarsiger chrysaeus)
(bird species of China) golden parrotbill (Suthora verreauxi)

sentences.english: Two golden curves across the card surface add an artistic touch to the design.
sentences.chinese: 另外卡面設計以兩道金色弧線爲主題，極富藝術感。

sentences.english: A silver mirror, coated with a gold-coloured protective layer.
sentences.chinese: 銀色鏡面塗層加上金色保護層。

sentences.english: Over one hundred years later, golden fruit formed for the first time on the pale tree.
sentences.chinese: 一百多年後，白耀之樹第一次結出了金色果實。

sentences.english: Up. He was still smiling, but his ocher eyes were serious.
sentences.chinese: 他還是微笑着，但他黑金色的眸子顯得很認真。

sentences.english: The golden school-time days have gone down in youth history and will not come back again.
sentences.chinese: 金色的學生時代，已載入了青春史冊，一去不復還。

sentences.english: Four golden characters meaning "Cultural Site of Shaolin" are carved above the stone archway.
sentences.chinese: 石坊正門前額刻着“少林勝蹟”四個金色大字。

sentences.english: A golden jackal seen in the Mesopotamian marshes.
sentences.chinese: 這是一隻生活在美索不達米亞沼澤中的金色豺狼。

sentences.english: This golden youth long since was past.
Her golden hair flared like the sun.
sentences.chinese: 她那金色的頭髮像陽光般熠熠發亮。

sentences.english: They decorated the room with green paint and a gold paper.
sentences.chinese: 他們用綠色油漆和金色牆紙裝飾房間。

sentences.english: Leaving Harry an old Snitch – what the hell was that about?
sentences.chinese: 留給哈利一箇舊的金色小賊，幹什麼用呀？

sentences.english: The place looked calm in the golden evening light.
sentences.chinese: 這個地方在金色的斜暉中顯得十分寧靜。

sentences.english: I don't think I'd ever grow up on Golden Pond. Do you understand?
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我在金色池塘永遠也長不大，你明白嗎？
